name: Anim In Space Remastared
description:
ANIM IN SPACE REMASTARED

This game contains a complete remake of the original Anim in Space by Gamejolt!. it contains an .exe file that can be run easily.

The new edition contains.

- Revamped scenes from 2020.

- Better movement system

- New storyboard.

- Lots of memes from 2017-2018 which also includes Dead by Daylight content.

- Revised graphics in general

- A 1080p Ultimate Widescreen variant.
